snippet: An international human rights commission said the country must correct a “serious and urgent situation” at a center housing mostly Haitian immigrants in Nassau.
abstract: Inter-American Commission on Human Rights tells Bahamas that it must improve conditions for mostly Haitian immigrants housed in detention center outside Nassau.
lead_paragraph: An international human rights commission said the country must correct a “serious and urgent situation” at a center housing mostly Haitian immigrants in Nassau.

headline.main: Bahamas Told to Improve Conditions at Center Housing Haitian Immigrants

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Human Rights and Human Rights Violations
